title: Making The Lab Leak Case, Bret Weinstein & Yuri Deigin
description:
This is a complimentary film alongside Rebel Wisdom's 'Sensemaking the Lab Leak', with a deeper dive into the case for the Lab Leak, made by evolutionary biologist Bret Weinstein and independent researcher Yuri Deigin. We recommend watching 'Sensemaking the Lab Leak' first: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BWQikatEYbI

Bret has argued the case for a lab leak for many months, on his Dark Horse podcast, and on shows like Bill Maher. 

Yuri Deigin is an entrepreneur and independent researcher with the 'DRASTIC' collective (Decentralised Radical Autonomous Search Team Investigating Covid-19).

Yuri Deigin will be joining the Rebel Wisdom Digital Campfire for a discussion with Rebel Wisdom Members around this topic on Monday 21st July: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/campfire-events

We have put together a comprehensive newsletter and briefing document on the Lab Leak story, see here: https://mailchi.mp/rebelwisdom.co.uk/8sgup081zu
